橤字的基本解释

橤
ruǐ
〔橤橤〕垂落的样子，如“橤橤芬华落。”
古同“蕊”，花；花蕊：“黄金橤绽红玉房。”

橤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruǐ］
［《集韻》乳捶切，上紙，日。］
见“橤橤”。

橤字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橤； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页554第15
【唐韻】如壘切【集韻】【韻會】乳捶切，?緌上聲。木名。【說文】垂也。或作蘂。【文選·盧諶時興詩】橤橤芬華落。　又【左思·蜀都賦】敷蘂葳蕤。【註】花鬚頭點也。【古音】讀如我切。○按《廣韻》：華外曰萼，華內曰蘂。《韻譜》或作蘂，通作橤。則蘂、橤自通。

橤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橤字的起名意思

同“蕊”，花，花蕊；下垂的样子。

Basic explanation of words
Core
ruǐ
[Rui Rui] The appearance of falling down, such as "Rui Ruifen Hualu."
The ancient same "stamen", flower; stamen: "Golden stamen blooming with red jade room."

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　 Rui; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 554 15
[Tang Yun] Ru Lei cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] breast beat and cut, sound on the sound. Wooden name. [Said the text] Chui Ye. Or as a core. [Selected Works·Fashionable Poems by Lu Chen] Rui Ruifen Hualuo.　[Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] Fu Rui Wei. [Note] The flower's beard head is also nodded. [Ancient Sound] Read like I am. ○According to "Guang Yun": Huawai said calyx, Huanei said Rui. "Rhyme" or Zuorui, Tong Zuorui. Then Rui, Rui Zitong.
